thread.title: Picked: Jordan Ayew gets nod to face Baba Rahman at Stamford Bridge
thread.title_full: Picked: Jordan Ayew gets nod to face Baba Rahman at Stamford Bridge

title: Picked: Jordan Ayew gets nod to face Baba Rahman at Stamford Bridge
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 15:56 CET Picked: Jordan Ayew gets nod to face Baba Rahman at Stamford Bridge - www.allsports.com.gh 
Jordan Ayew had been given the nod by Aston Villa manager Tim Sherwood to lead the lines as the Villa Park club visit English Premier League Champions Chelsea at Stamford Bridge. 
The Ghanaian started the first two Premier League games for Aston Villa after arriving from FC Lorient in the summer transfer window but has since settled for substitute appearances from the bench. play
